mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: There are 14 stained-glass windows in the sanctuary or auditorium of Judson Memorial Church, and 3 in the main stairwell. All but the rose window in the chancel were designed by John La Farge between 1892 and 1910; they were manufactured by the Decorative Stained Glass Company and Thomas Wright between 1892 and 1915. [work]
